content: *soft heart beanie - seamless chemo cap crochet pattern* this soft and seamless crochet chemo cap pattern is designed with comfort and care in mind perfect for sensitive scalps during cancer treatment the beanie is crocheted seamlessly from the top down with no irritating seams using simple basic stitches that are beginner-friendly and quick to work up it comes in 6 sizes preemie baby toddler child teen and adult and creates a warm cozy and comfortable fit that s gentle on delicate skin this easy chemo hat pattern is ideal for donating to cancer centers gifting to loved ones going through treatment/ **pattern attributes** - the pattern is simple detailed and thoroughly tested - written in us terms - skill level advanced beginner - yarn type # 4 worsted weight yarn - crochet hook h 5mm - pattern includes a step-by-step detailed written instructions - includes instructions for 6 sizes from preemie through adult large **sizes** - preemie fits head circumference 10 -15 - infant fits head circumference 15 -17 - toddler fits head circumference 17 -19 - child fits head circumference 19 -21 - teen fits head circumference 21 -23 - adult fits head circumference 23 -24
